about: What it is: A limited-edition, full-size kit with the bestselling Detox Shampoo and Detangling and Frizz Fighting Leave In Conditioner to cleanse, detangle, and hydrate your way to healthy hair...Hair Texture: Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily..Hair Type: Fine, Medium, and Thick..Hair Concerns:- Flaky, Dry Scalp.- Frizz.- Scalp Buildup..Key Benefits:.Detox Shampoo:- Cleanses without stripping.- Conditions, detangles, and fights frizz.- Removes product buildup..Leave In Conditioner:.- Provides hydration and heat protection up 450u00b0F/232u00b0C..- Conditions, detangles and fights frizz.- Leaves hair smooth, shiny and manageable..Highlighted Ingredients:- Tamarind Seed Extract: Weightlessly hydrates hair..- Hydrolyzed Proteins: Protect against damage..- Chelating Agents: Remove hard water deposits and impurities...Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. These products are also gluten-free and cruelty-free...What Else You Need to Know: This bestselling duo is only available for a limited time. The clarifying Detox Shampoo powerfully cleanses away dirt, oil, and product buildup with apple cider vinegar while strengthening hair with keratin. The Detangling and Frizz Fighting Leave In Conditioner detangles hair and protects against heat and damage, reducing frizz and flyaways...Fragrance Description: The Detox Shampoou2019s fragrance, Melrose Place, has top notes of champagne, pink peppercorn, berry, and lychee; heart notes of peony, rose, freesia, jasmine, and bergamot; and base notes of amber, sandalwood, white musk, and cedarwood...The Detangling and Frizz Fighting Leave In Conditioneru2019s fragrance, North Bondi, has top notes of bergamot, apple blossom, raspberry, and Italian lemon; heart notes of rose de mai, jasmine, and violet; and base notes of patchouli, sandalwood, and white musk...This Set Contains:- 10 oz/ 300 mL Detox Shampoo (full size).- 4.7 oz/ 140 mL Detangling and Frizz Fighting Leave In Conditioner (full size)

how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.Detox Shampoo:.-Detangle and brush your hair before getting in the shower. This helps to loosen any product buildup, stimulates the scalp, and removes tangles..-Wet hair with lukewarm water from roots to ends. .-Squeeze out extra water..-Take a quarter-size amount of Detox Shampoo and mix it in your hands..-Apply directly to your scalp first, then work throughout hair, moving from roots to mid-shafts to ends..-Leave on for one to three minutes..-Rinse...Detangling and Frizz Fighting Leave In Conditioner:.On wet hair:.-Spray from about six to eight inches away, moving from your eyeline down. .-Brush hair with a wide-tooth comb. This will allow the right amount of product to reach the roots without directly applying it there...On dry hair:.-People with thicker, coarser, or curlier strands can apply to dry hair for a much-needed dose of hydration, shine, frizz, and flyaway control.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I first received OUAI shampoo and leave-in condition in trial pack. This product is amazing! With my first shampoo, I could feel a difference in my hair. Softer, shinier and easier to manage. When you get to be a senior citizen, your hair changes. Mine is getting so limp. The OUAI products really brought some of the youthful feeling back. I especially love the leave in conditioner. It's a must to comb through smoothly, without pulling out hair and conditions while being dried.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very nice product duo! This is my first time purchasing ouai products. Both of these products smell amazing. The fragrance from the detox shampoo lingers in my hair most of the day after showering. I can tell that the shampoo and leave-in conditioner will last me for a long time, considering a little goes a long way.   Keep in mind that the detox shampoo is a clarifying shampoo. So you'll want to only use it once a week or as often as you feel you need product build-up removed from your hair. Do not use this shampoo excessively, as I have seen some reviews mention hair loss from this particular product. This is a normal potential side effect of using clarifying shampoo too frequently.
